About.title: About the Project
About.intro: This platform is a solo project created with the goal of transforming how people learn languages. It combines smart AI features and a user-friendly chat interface to help learners improve naturally and independently.
About.teamDescription: This platform is built by a single developer who wears all the hats: UX designer, backend engineer, frontend developer, and AI integrator. The idea was born out of a desire to create a practical, motivational, and modern tool for language learners. By combining technical skills with a deep interest in education, the creator aimed to develop something meaningful and useful for everyday learners—something that blends simplicity, interactivity, and personal growth.
About.visionDescription: The vision behind this project is to make language learning more than just studying vocabulary or grammar. It’s about daily interaction, context-based improvement, and building confidence through use. The platform is designed to help people integrate language into their daily routine through chat-based exercises, real-time feedback, and AI-powered analysis—without the pressure of a traditional classroom. The goal is to empower independent learners and make self-paced language learning feel intuitive, rewarding, and human.

Help.title: Help Center
Help.intro: Need assistance? Explore our frequently asked questions and troubleshooting guides below.
Help.faq1Question: How do I reset my password?
Help.faq1Answer: Go to the login screen and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions to reset your password via email.
Help.faq2Question: How do I change the interface language?
Help.faq2Answer: Use the language switcher in the top right corner to select your preferred language.
Help.faq3Question: Why can't I access certain features?
Help.faq3Answer: Some features are only available after registration or login. Please make sure you're signed in.
